title: Beantown Breakdown - 4 Singles Left (including "rare" double beantown stamp!)

posts.post_title: Beantown Breakdown - 4 Singles Left (including "rare" double beantown stamp!)
posts.post_content:
This is a break up of the 117 card lot I purchased from Steve.  Selling as singles.  Asking $25 each delivered, but make me an offer I can't refuse; paypal gift preferred.  All of the cards present well.  Here are larger images that should show every detail.

Take the remaining four cards for $80!
